Flow.description: This flow is created to run on the Assessments tab on Mental Health Community v2
Flow.label: Assessment Flow

fields.name: Consent_Text
fields.fieldText: Consent for Sharing Information

fields.name: Personal_Info_Label
fields.fieldText:
First Name :

Last Name :

Date of Birth :

Sex :

fields.name: Personal_Info_Label_2
fields.fieldText:
John

Appleseed

15/07/1980

Male

fields.name: Consent_Message1
fields.fieldText: Information about you is confidential but may be shared with your permission, or if required by law, or in other specific circumstances. Information may also be shared with other agencies, or with a relative, carer or friend, if it is reasonably required for your treatment and care and it is in your best interests.

fields.name: Consent_Checkbox
fields.fieldText: The treating team has explained the information sharing circumstances to me and I understand what information will be shared, why it is shared and with whom it will be shared, And I consent to the information being shared.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please check this box and give consent in order to continue to the questionnaire.

fields.name: Review_Summary
fields.fieldText: Review Summary

fields.name: Personal_Info_Summary_Label
fields.fieldText: Personal Information﻿

fields.name: Personal_Info_Confirmation
fields.fieldText:
First Name :

Last Name :

Date of Birth :

Sex :

fields.name: Personal_Info_Confirmation2
fields.fieldText:
John

Appleseed

15/07/1980

Male

fields.name: Answers_Info_Summary_Label
fields.fieldText: Your Answers

fields.name: Confirmation
fields.fieldText:
1. Did you feel tired out for no good reason?

Your Answer : {!Answer1}


2. Did you feel nervous?

Your Answer : {!Answer2}


3. Did you feel so nervous that nothing could calm you down?

Your Answer : {!Answer3}


4. Did you feel hopeless?

Your Answer : {!Answer4}


5. Did you feel restless or fidgety?

Your Answer : {!Answer5}


6. Did you feel so restless you could not sit still?

Your Answer : {!Answer6}


7. Did you feel depressed?

Your Answer : {!Answer7}


8. Did you feel everything was an effort?

Your Answer : {!Answer8}


9. Did you feel so sad that nothing could cheer you up?

Your Answer : {!Answer9}


10. Did you feel worthless?

Your Answer : {!Answer10}

fields.name: Question1
fields.fieldText: 1. Did you feel tired out for no good reason?

fields.name: Question2
fields.fieldText: 2. Did you feel nervous?

fields.name: Question3
fields.fieldText: 3. Did you feel so nervous that nothing could calm you down?

fields.name: Question4
fields.fieldText: 4. Did you feel hopeless?

fields.name: Question5
fields.fieldText: 5. Did you feel restless or fidgety?

fields.name: ThankYouMessage
fields.fieldText:
Thank you!

Your responses are recorded.

fields.name: Question6
fields.fieldText: 6. Did you feel so restless you could not sit still?

fields.name: Question7
fields.fieldText: 7. Did you feel depressed?

fields.name: Question8
fields.fieldText: 8. Did you feel everything was an effort?

fields.name: Question9
fields.fieldText: 9. Did you feel so sad that nothing could cheer you up?

fields.name: Question10
fields.fieldText: 10. Did you feel worthless?
